resources.string: Enter what you want to buy...
\"CanBuy!\" Is a reminder to prevent forgetting to shop!
How to prevent forgetting to shop?
\"CanBuy!\" Will notify you when you are nearing a store where you can take notes.\nTo use this function, turn on the \"GPS\" switch on the upper left.

First swipe to the tab that matches the category of what you want to buy.
For example, if you want to buy "potatoes", swipe to the "groceries" tab.
After swiping, write down what you want to buy!
Now "CanBuy!" Will be able to notify you when a suitable store is approaching.
Character string containing \",\" cannot be entered!
If you do not allow location information, you will not be able to obtain facility information!
